# LDtkFile.GetEntityRef&lt;T&gt; method

Gets an entity from an *reference* converted to *T*.

```csharp
public T GetEntityRef<T>(EntityReference reference)
    where T : new()
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | The type to convert the entity to. |
| reference | The entityRef to convert. |

## Return Value

The converted entity.
